data.what_is:
Not another faceless email marketing company. 

We love people and the excitement of seeing businesses succeed! 

Don't get us wrong, we love creating powerful email marketing software too; we just think that if you're paying for a platform, you should also get personal support & expert advice to make the most of it. 

Technology & software is only ever as good as the people using it. We will show you how to get the most out of your investment and how to make a success of your business.
data.product_description: Consists of 3 elements to support you in your journey from marketing novice to marketing superhero. The Wired Plus vision is to arm our customers with the right tools and knowledge, to encourage you to hit your goals and then exceed them.

initial_reviews.review_title: Lovely AM, not optimal set up for managed service
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Wired Plus?
Our account manager is really nice and helpful. Good integrations with our commerce platform to track roi. We use wired for their managed service, and have our own templates built within the system.

What do you dislike about Wired Plus?
Managed service requires our team to input a lot of work, which you'd expect to be included on wired plus' side. I also don't have access to much reporting functionality

What problems is Wired Plus solving and how is that benefiting you?
Saves a marginal amount of time in building my email campaigns.
